Name: Mosaique Neko Waifus 2
About the game: How have you been? Crazy times we live in huh? Luckily you know just the right Neko girls! Care to recite some poetry with Sara? Or eat cookies with Niko? I think Sayouri and Sara have a secret romance going on. So sweet to look at them cuddling together! • Solve puzzles by rotating the right elements • Navigate the different dialogue choices, show the girls your charm! • Use special abilities that help you solve puzzles • Level up special abilities • Collect items that will boost your skills • view all the scenes unlocked in the gallery
